title: Bilgewater ward skin won't appear in game
body: I bought the Slaughter Fleet ward skin, and checked the check box in the the store, yet in game, the default ward still appears. Is anyone else having this issue, and if so, do you know how to fix it?

replies.body:
Hey Entropy Spark,

I was able to select the Slaughter Fleet ward and have it display properly in game. Is this happening to you every game? I would try deselecting the ward and re-selecting it to see if that resolves the issue if you're experiencing this in multiple games.
